stepTitle: Use the example data to construct a 95% confidence interval for the mean sensory rate for the population (assumed normal) from which you took the data. (8.6, 9.4, 7.9, 6.8, 8.3, 7.3, 9.2, 9.6, 8.7, 11.4, 10.3, 5.4, 8.1, 5.5, 6.9)
stepBody: Round answers to two decimal place. Wrap answer with parenthesis, separete by a comma, no spacing.
